name: Sailing Ship Race XL
description:
Sail your sailing ship with motion control (gyroscope) through the exciting levels.

- Control the ship by tilting your input device
- 3 different race tracks
- 12 levels to the finish
- Local and interent highscore for all race tracks
- Movable and immovable opponents
- Guns shoot at your hull and sails
- Bigger Interface
- Ad free!
